name: UAC Bypass Tools Using ComputerDefaults
description: Detects tools such as UACMe used to bypass UAC with computerdefaults.exe (UACMe 59)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((winlog.event_data.IntegrityLevel:(High OR System) AND process.executable:C\:\\Windows\\System32\\ComputerDefaults.exe) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:(*\:\\Windows\\System32* OR *\:\\Program\ Files*))))`
